column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Visited this establishment on Saturday for lunch while in Chicago.  Excellent service and food.  We ordered the salad
column2: cheddar cubes and classic pizza.  Loved it! The restaurant seemed kind of small but it was kind of cozy.  The wait was kind of long
column3: but it really didn't bother me too much. Free Wi-fi so I could check in.  Will definately be trying this again.
